name: Paneer Kurkure Momos
description: Flour wrappers are filled with a healthy filling of Cottage Cheese and fried with a batter of Bread Crumbs to make an appetizing snack.

name: Veg Afghani Momos
description: Momos, cream, steamed chicken, curd, chaat masala.

name: Tandoori Chicken Momos
description: Seasoned and grilled to perfection in a tandoor, these momos are packed with flavor, texture, and a delicious taste.

name: Paneer Momos Tandoori
description: Made with juicy, spiced paneer, these momos are grilled to perfection in a tandoor, resulting in a delicious flavor.

name: Veg Momos
description: Veg momos are steamed dumplings stuffed with a lightly spiced vegetable filling.

name: Chicken Momos
description: Chicken mince flavoured with soy sauce, chilies, pepper are stuffed inside a thin flour dough filling and then steamed.
